sentence: +8 View gallery +8 View gallery Conservatives are grumbling over former President Donald Trump's (left) decision to back Dr. Mehmet Oz (right) in the May 17 Republican Senate primary +8 View gallery Human Events' Jack Posobiec, a Pennsylvania native, tweeted out footage of a vintage Dr. Oz episode that focused on transgender children +8 View gallery Posobiec also highlighted an Oz tweet from 2018 that suggested the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention should conduct a study on gun violence 'You're not America First.
author: Nikki Schwab
title: MAGA turns on Trump for endorsing Dr. Oz: Supporters tear into TV star's past comments on abortion and transgender issues after ex-president gave him prized backing in Pennsylvania Senate race

sentence: Saturday, during his latest coup-coup hate rally, Donald Trump officially endorsed Dr. Mehmet Oz in the GOP Pennsylvania Senate primary.
author: Stephen Robinson
title: Trump Thinks TV Quack Dr. Oz Qualified For Elected Office
